clean_data: Senior Database Administrator Senior span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Senior Database Administrator CYBERMATE INFOTEK Pvt Ltd Having 56 years of experience as MS SQL Server Database Administrator It includes Installations Configurations Upgrades Migrations and Production support Extensive DBA experience in supporting SQL Server instances comprising of versions 082008R22012 on 24x7 production environment Respond quickly and effectively to production development issues and taking responsibility for those issues through resolution Good experience in Performance Monitoring and Tuning Backup Restoration Recovery and Export Import of SQL Databases Maintaining High database availability like Log shipping clustering Mirroring and AAG for supporting nonstop Business Operations Applying Patches by Service pack installation and hot fix application strategies UpgradeMigration of MS SQL Server 2005 to MS SQL Server 2012 using any suitable approach in place or side by side Experience in automation of SQL Server activities including jobs maintenance plans Hands on experience on Database periodical refresh as per requirement Developed Backup strategies for Database Recovery backing up database backing up data files log files verifying the integrity of backup files Closely monitoring the growth of the databases as a part of capacity planning Experience in supporting Windows SQL Clustering ActivePassive ActiveActive services Have been proven my flexibility to work in Oncall support 24x7 Good communication skills strong problem solving with documentation Work Experience Senior Database Administrator CYBERMATE INFOTEK Pvt Ltd September 2013 to Present Worked as Database Administrator in A N IT Solutions PVT Ltd from Aug 2010 to Sep 2013 Additional Information TECHNICAL SKILLS Databases MSSQL Server 20052008R22012 Operating Systems Windows Server 20032008 XP Monitoring Tools Performance Monitor SQL Profiler Industry Exposure Banking domain Retail and Manufacturing
